alert.note: Alert for San Bernardino County-Upper Colorado River Valley (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 20 at 10:20AM PST until January 22 at 4:00PM PST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...LAKE WIND ADVISORY IS CANCELLED... ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM PST /11 AM MST/ FRIDAY TO 4 PM PST /5 PM MST/ SATURDAY... * WHAT...The Lake Wind Advisory has been cancelled. Lingering breezes 20 to 30 MPH with winds around 20 MPH are likely though this afternoon. Isolated higher winds are possible in northern Lake Mohave near Laughlin this afternoon. The Wind Advisory on Friday and Saturday remains in effect, with north winds 20 to 25 mph with gusts up to 45 mph expected. * WHERE...In Nevada, Lake Mead National Recreation Area. In California, San Bernardino County-Upper Colorado River Valley. In Arizona, Lake Mead National Recreation Area and Lake Havasu and Fort Mohave. * WHEN...From 10 AM PST /11 AM MST/ Friday to 4 PM PST /5 PM MST/ Saturday. * IMPACTS...Strong winds and rough waves on area lakes will create hazardous boating conditions. Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Wave heights between 1 and 3 feet expected Friday and Saturday on area lakes.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: San Bernardino County-Upper Colorado River Valley
